product_name: REI CoolMax EcoMade Low Socks - Girls' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The girls' REI CoolMax(R) EcoMade Low Socks outfit young adventurers' feet for cycling, hiking and running. CoolMax EcoMade fabric offers the same moisture-wicking, quick-drying performance as regular CoolMax, and is made of recycled PET. Nylon adds durability and spandex offers stretch and shape retention; the snug fit will remain, wash after wash. Mesh-knit instep panels promote airflow and help move moisture away; heels and toes are reinforced to increase longevity. "No feel'' seams help eliminate irritation and chafing along the toes. Closeout.
short_description: The girls' REI CoolMax(R) EcoMade Low Socks outfit young adventurers' feet for cycling, hiking and running.
